page.title: 06View From A Peterlee Window.
page.content:
Outside my bedroom window I can see the different{factories,}like{N.S.K and{D.J.B. Engineering.
On a night I can see all the men going to work. My brother works at{N.S.K making ball bearings.
Sometimes the smell of the chemicals can be deathly. My mam sometimes complains but the smell still goes on.
On a night I can hear the cars on the {A19.}When I'm in bed I often listen to them and see how many I can count. Occasionally I can't get to sleep because lorries come along and keep me awake.
